help-file.title: CENOBITE
help-file.content:
A Cenobite is a multi-class Druid/Cleric.
Notes on Cenobite: Druids commune, which is heavilly based on terrain, for both spells and commune times. Clerics pray, and require no spellbooks or totems. If you start as a Druid, you will commune all your spells. If you start as a Cleric, you will pray spells.
